title_narrative: FAO-China SSC Program - Response and Recovery to the impact of COVID-19 in CELAC countries
description_narrative: The implementation of COVID-19 response and recovery policies and programs by governments of 12 CELAC and FAOs member nations with a focus on the most vulnerable populations, through South-South Cooperation
